main event: A man reported seeing a silvery disc-shaped object over Columbus, Ohio on September 3, 1965.
interesting points: The object was moving very fast and smoothly with no sound., The sighting lasted for 2 minutes., The object was observed traveling from east to west at a 50 degree angle., The witness did not provide his name or address., The report was documented by military personnel.
witness description: a man who did not provide his name or address
